VCIAS — Vegggie Central Intelligence Agency Society

We’re a playful collective investigating the secret lives of vegetables, building veggie projects, and sharing recipes, art, and tiny experiments. Everyone is welcome — whether you love gardening, gadgets, or goofy conspiracy-free fun.

About VCIAS

VCIAS (Vegggie Central Intelligence Agency Society) is a serious, highly enthusiastic group that loves veggies,(only the good ones tho) creativity, and community-driven projects. We make stuff, host things sometimes, prototype tiny farming robots, (not anymore) and eventually dress up as giant carrots.

Join VCIAS

We run friendly events, host a small forum, and share resources. No experience required — just bring curiosity and maybe a snack.
